description: Unlock the existing product from SAP, keeping the existing one

parameters.name: partner_id
parameters.description: Partner ID is assigned when registration is successful. Required for all requests.

parameters.name: timestamp
parameters.description: This is to indicate the timestamp of the request. Required for signature authentication.

parameters.name: access_token
parameters.description: The token for API access, using to identify your permission to use, take API number use and expires in 2 hours

parameters.name: msg_id
parameters.description: Shopeee's unique identifier for a shop. Required param for flow API.

parameters.name: sign
parameters.description: Signature generated by partner_id, api_path, timestamp, access_token, shop_id and partner_key via HMAC-SHA256

parameters.name: error
parameters.description: Indicate error type if hit error. Empty if no error happened

parameters.name: message
parameters.description: Indicate error details if hit error. Empty if no error happened

parameters.name: warning
parameters.description: Indicate warning details if hit warning. Empty if no warning happened

parameters.name: request_id
parameters.description: The identifier for an API request for error tracking

parameters.name: item_id
parameters.description: Shopee's unique identifier for an item
